scripts.dev: docker-compose -f ./docker-compose.development.yml up -d && sleep 1 && dotenv -e ./src/env/.env.development -- prisma migrate dev && dotenv -e ./src/env/.env.development nodemon src/server.ts
scripts.test: docker-compose -f ./docker-compose.test.yml up -d && sleep 1 && dotenv -e ./src/env/.env.test -- prisma migrate dev && dotenv -e ./src/env/.env.test jest && docker-compose down
